<file path="source.cpp">
class Point {
    void Point()
    void Point(double x, double y)
    void Point(Point& other)
    virtual void ~Point()
    double getX()
    double getY()
    void setX(double x)
    void setY(double y)
    virtual double distanceFromOrigin()
};
class Point3D : public Point {
    void Point3D(double x, double y, double z)
    double getZ()
    void setZ(double z)
    double distanceFromOrigin()
};
template<typename T>
class Container {
    void Container(T& value)
    T () const
    void setValue(T& value)
};
template<typename T>
T max(T& a, T& b) {
    {
            return (a > b) ? a : b;
        }
}
template<typename T>
T min(T& a, T& b) {
    {
            return (a < b) ? a : b;
        }
}
int main();
</file>
